system.description:
Time: 25-RSI secondsRitual: Prayer
Range: SelfDuration: 10 (MS); 30 (CS) mins.

This invocation allows the cleric to open any desired language to SB3 (same family) or to SB2 (alien family). The cleric may then speak and understand this language at double ML for Duration. When the invocation expires, the cleric can make one (MS) or three (CS) Skill Development Rolls for that language. Elomia's Tongue may be used on an open language with the same effects to ML and skill developments.
